remarks: Part of proof of Lemma H of [Crawley] p. 118.  (Contributed by NM, 16-Jun-2013.)
statement:
cdlemh.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
cdlemh.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
cdlemh.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
cdlemh.m $e |- ./\ = ( meet ` K ) $.
cdlemh.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
cdlemh.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
cdlemh.t $e |- T = ( ( LTrn ` K ) ` W ) $.
cdlemh.r $e |- R = ( ( trL ` K ) ` W ) $.
cdlemh.s $e |- S = ( ( P .\/ ( R ` G ) ) ./\ ( Q .\/ ( R ` ( G o. `' F ) ) ) ) $.
cdlemh.z $e |- .0. = ( 0. ` K ) $.
cdlemh2 $p |- ( ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ F e. T /\ G e. T ) /\ ( ( P e. A /\ -. P .<_ W ) /\ ( Q e. A /\ -. Q .<_ W ) ) /\ ( F =/= ( _I |` B ) /\ G =/= ( _I |` B ) /\ ( R ` F ) =/= ( R ` G ) ) ) -> ( S ./\ W ) = .0. ) $.
